long_description: The Gerber Crucial multi-tool combines the light, compact design and smooth style of your favorite pocket knife with the full-function components of a multi-tool. Saf.T. Plus system locks components securely in place for worry-free use. Spring-loaded needlenose pliers make deployment quick and easy. Stainless-steel, blunt-tip blade is partially serrated. Other features include carabiner clip, bottle opener, Phillips screwdriver and standard screwdriver.
short_description: The Gerber Crucial multi-tool combines the light, compact design and smooth style of your favorite pocket knife with the full-function components of a multi-tool.
